citations.narrative:
* The record of dogs on hand was incomplete. The record did not have completed names and addresses from where the
animals were acquired for 12 of the 13 dogs present. The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms
which fully and correctly disclose the required information required by section 2.75 of this subpart concerning each dog or
cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held in his or her possession or under his or her control, or which is
transported, euthanized, sold, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer.
* To be corrected by: 9/9/22
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
* The record of dogs on hand was incomplete.  The record did not have completed names and addresses from where the 
animals were acquired for 12 of the 13 dogs present.  The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms 
which fully and correctly disclose the required information required by section 2.75 of this subpart concerning each dog or 
cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held in his or her possession or under his or her control, or which is 
transported, euthanized, sold, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer. 
* To be corrected by: 9/9/22 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
